data.title: Pax Bai and Lee Spielman at Sunset Sound - Converse Rubber Tracks
data.description:
When Converse Rubber Tracks opened up sessions at Los Angeles' iconic Sunset Sound to emerging musicians from around the world, China’s Pax Bai got the chance to travel to America for the first time - and to make new music in a space that recorded decades of classic rock records.  After finishing up in the studio, he had time to experience some local color from the ultimate tour guide: Trash Talk’s Lee Spielman took Pax around the city to show the young musician his side of LA.  

Listen to a new track from Pax Bai’s sessions at Sunset Sound, “Circle” 

See more stories from the Converse Rubber Tracks global studio takeover

data.title: Coro MC and MV Bill at Toca do Bandido - Converse Rubber Tracks
data.description:
Coro MC knows what it’s like to have to rise above his circumstances. The rapper and beatmaker hails from Fortaleza, Brazil, a northern city whose culture often gets overlooked in favor of the country’s sunnier, richer South. But breaking through barriers is nothing new for the hardworking MC - and the struggle has just made him that much more hungry to prove himself. During the Converse Rubber Tracks global studio takeover, Coro MC headed to Rio for a recording session at the world-class Toca do Bandido, where he had an unexpected visit from one of his musical icons - legendary Brazilian rapper MV Bill. 

Listen to a new track from Coro MC’s sessions at Toca do Bandido “Insolita Sensacao”
See more stories from the Converse Rubber Tracks global studio takeover

data.title: Vaya Futuro and Ben Allen at Greenhouse Studios - Converse Rubber Tracks
data.description:
Tijuana’s Vaya Futuro take an atmospheric approach to their expansive shoegaze, crafting yearning anthems perfect for soundtracking widescreen landscapes. For their Converse Rubber Tracks session, they headed to the one of the world's most striking environments to record in the top-level rooms at Iceland’s Greenhouse Studios. While in the studio, their session was joined by an unexpected collaborator - veteran producer Ben Allen came through to add his expertise to the band's new material. 

Listen to a new track from Vaya Futuro’s sessions at Greenhouse, “Congelar”

See more stories from the Converse Rubber Tracks global studio takeover

data.title: Planta Carnívora and Big Boi at Stankonia - Converse Rubber Tracks
data.description:
Raw, improvisational, and totally unfiltered, Chile’s Planta Carnívora makes independent rap that sounds anything but cookie-cutter. When Converse Rubber Tracks opened up ATL’s Stankonia for free recording sessions, she jumped at the chance to work on new music in the place where some of the world’s most innovative hip-hop was born. Her session got even more hype with a surprise visit from an ATL legend - Big Boi himself came through to give the young artist some guidance on her new tracks.

Hear a new song from Planta Carnívora’s sessions at Stankonia “Flamingo Rose”

See more stories from the Converse Rubber Tracks global studio takeover

data.title: Converse Rubber Tracks Sample Library : Machinedrum
data.description: North Carolina producer Machinedrum walks you through the Converse Rubber Tracks Sample Library. A royalty free library of over 20,000 high quality one shots, loops and stems from incredibly talented musicians we've had in our CRT studios including samples from Machinedrum himself.

data.title: Converse Rubber Tracks Sample Library : iOS app with Machinedrum
data.description: American producer Machinedrum introduces the Converse Rubber Tracks Sample Library iOS mobile app, a tool for quickly browsing and sorting through one-shot examples available in our CRT Sample Library in a mobile-optimized way.

asset.title: Converse Rubber Tracks Sample Library : iOS app with Machinedrum

data.title: Converse Rubber Tracks Sample Library : Ableton Live plugin with Machinedrum.
data.description: American electronic music producer Machinedrum talks through the Converse Rubber Tracks Sample Library Ableton update. The Live plugin is a web-integrated sampler and effect unit that allows Ableton Live users to access their favorite samples from the Converse Sample Library without leaving Live, enabling producers to integrate high quality samples in to track in a seamless way.

data.title: Killason "Hoddest in my town" - Converse Avant-Poste
data.description:
Killason is a young French artist who was raised around hip-hop culture. He multiplies experiences and is distinguished by its highly stylized acuity in dance and is now taking on rap with the same mordant vivacity, precision and endurance gesture. Watch his performance as part of the Converse Avant-Poste series.

Converse Avant-Poste is a long-term celebration of emerging artists & musicians in the region - and will feature gigs and regular films of the most exciting new talent from the city. Stay tuned to Converse YouTube for more coming soon.

Track: "Hoddest in my town" by Killason 
 
Video director : Vivien Fossez
Shot by : Alexis Rieger, Romain Khun, Thomas Bailly, Vivien Fossez
Sound : Henri Darmancourt
Production : Artbreakerz

data.title: Converse Cons Nightlines
data.description:
Nightlines is inspired by the raw energy of summer nights in the city when crowds, security and the heat allow skaters to own the streets.  Starring Mike Anderson, Aaron Herrington, Nuge, Sage Elsesser, Sean Pablo, Louie Lopez, Eli Reed and Zered Bassett and featuring Al Davis, Brian DelaTorre and Ben Kadow. Nightlines was shot in NYC, and other cities over the course of Summer 2015.

Film by: Richard Quintero
Soundtrack: “Bull in the Heather” - Sonic Youth

Share your own nightlines with #nightlines

data.title: Pink Lung (White Lung x Pink Mountaintops) – “Chinese Watermelon”
data.description:
“Chinese Watermelon” is the fourth and final single off of the third Converse CONS compilation, CONS EP Vol. 3. The song was written by Stephen McBean and Mish Way and produced by Ryan Castle.

Stream or download “Chinese Watermelon” here: https://soundcloud.com/conversemusic/pink-lung-white-lung-x-pink-mountaintops-chinese-watermelon

Video produced and directed by Justin Gradin and Ben Jacques.

Music by: Stephen McBean, Mish Way, Anne-Marie Vassiliou, Kenneth McCorkell
Written by: Stephen McBean and Mish Way
Vocals by: Stephen McBean and Mish Way
Directed by: Justin Gradin and Ben Jacques

data.title: Converse Rubber Tracks - Tower Hamlets
data.description:
Converse Rubber Tracks is a professional recording studio that takes up residency in different boroughs throughout London, offering the city’s most exciting new talent free recording and mixing time.

Following on from previous residencies at Snap Studios in Haringey and Kore Studios in Ealing, the series is now making its way to the London Borough of Tower Hamlets. Applications to record in the borough's unique Lightship 95 Studio in November are now open at http://www.converse-music.com/london

Music: Phobophobes 'No Flavour'
https://soundcloud.com/phobophobes

data.title: Terakaft “Karambani” - Converse Red Light Session
data.description: The perfect mix of Terakaft’s deep bass tones, pulsating heartbeat of percussion, and two rhythm guitars—one keeping the beat effortlessly, the other soaring and sweet—transported this Converse Red Light Session to the deepest heart of the desert.

asset.title: Terakaft “Karambani” - Converse Red Light Session
